statements: DELETE FROM lobbyists WHERE lawmaker_id = 5 AND interaction_type = 'meeting';
DELETE FROM lobbyists WHERE lobbyist_id = 101 AND interaction_type = 'Meeting';
DELETE FROM lobbyists WHERE lawmaker_id = 202 AND interaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE lawmaker_id = 25 AND date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM lobbyists WHERE organization = 'ACME Corp' AND lobbyist_id = 3
DELETE FROM lawmakers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE lobbyist_id = 1 AND lawmaker_id = 2;
DELETE FROM meetings WHERE location = 'Washington D.C.' AND lobbyist_id = 3;
